sentence.Network_en: Support chain level operation of membership, CRO, website and marketing!

sentence.Network_en: This is a first of a kind alliance between an Indian CRO and a Chinese CRO.

sentence.Network_en: A magnon - phonon interaction model is built on two dimensional insulating ferromagnetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要在二维正方绝缘铁磁系统基础上建立了一个磁振子-声子相互作用模型.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文2012年5月3日 - 你的祖先可能是克鲁马努人(Cro-Magnon),或者南方古猿( Australopithecus ),古人类经过了很多年的进化过程才成为了现在的你我。难道进化的结果就是让你我.
